report.title: Explore my records using standard filters
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in iRecord, with standardised filtering parameters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying) = '#filtered_survey_id#' OR '#filtered_survey_id#'='') #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: filtered_survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

column.name: occurrence_id
column.template: {occurrence_id}

column.name: source
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || case when substring(snf.survey_title from 1 for length(snf.website_title)) = w.title then trim(substring(snf.survey_title from length(snf.website_title)+1)) else snf.survey_title end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN LENGTH(snf.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE snf.recorders END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#user_id#' AND o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: belongs_to_site
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when o.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end

column.name: pass
column.sql:
CASE WHEN o.data_cleaner_result='t' THEN '
' WHEN not w.verification_checks_enabled THEN '
-
' END

column.name: fails
column.sql:
case when o.data_cleaner_result='f' then replace(replace(replace(replace(onf.data_cleaner_info, '[', '
') end

column.name: status_hint
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'Accepted' when 'R' then 'Not accepted' when 'T' then 'Test' when 'C' then case when record_substatus=3 then 'Plausible' when o.certainty='C' then 'Recorder considered this certain' when o.certainty='L' then 'Recorder considered this likely' when o.certainty='U' then 'Recorder considered this uncertain' else 'Not reviewed' end end || case o.record_substatus when 1 then ' as correct' when 2 then ' as considered correct' when 4 then ' as unable to verify' when 5 then ' as incorrect' else '' end || case o.query when 'A' then ', query raised and answered' when 'Q' then ', query raised' else '' end
